properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 4 at 2:39PM PST until January 6 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds 20 to 30 kt
with gusts up to 35 kt and steep seas 11 to 15 feet. For the
Hazardous Seas Warning, very steep and hazardous seas 12 to 15
feet at 11 seconds expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, south
winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and seas 11 to 14 feet
at 12 seconds expected.

* WHERE...All areas.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 AM PST Sunday. For
the Hazardous Seas Warning, from 10 AM to 10 PM PST Sunday. For
the Small Craft Advisory, from 10 PM Sunday to 4 PM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Very steep and hazardous seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Bar crossing will become especially
treacherous.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Recreational boaters should remain in port. Commercial vessels
should prepare for very steep seas and consider remaining in port
until conditions improve.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SUNDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM PST SUNDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM SUNDAY TO 4 PM PST MONDAY
